> [ggiraph](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/) makes ‘ggplot’
> graphics interactive.

## Overview

[![ggiraph
logo](reference/figures/logo.png)](https://github.com/davidgohel/ggiraph/)
[ggiraph](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/) is a tool that allows
you to create dynamic ggplot graphs. This allows you to add tooltips,
hover effects and JavaScript actions to the graphics. The package also
allows the selection of graphical elements when used in shiny
applications.

Interactivity is added to ggplot **geometries, legends and theme
elements**, via the following aesthetics:

- `tooltip`: tooltips to be displayed when mouse is over elements.
- `onclick`: JavaScript function to be executed when elements are
  clicked.
- `data_id`: id to be associated with elements (used for hover and click
  actions)

### Why use `{ggiraph}`

- You want to provide your readers with more information than the basic
  information available; you can display a tooltip when the user’s mouse
  is on a graphical element, you can also visually animate elements with
  the same attribute when the mouse passes over a graphical element, and
  finally you can link a JavaScript action to the click, such as opening
  a hypertext link.
- You want to allow users of a Shiny application to select graphical
  elements; for example, you can make the points of a scatter plot
  selectable and available as a reactive value from the server part of
  your application. With Shiny,
  [ggiraph](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/) allows interaction
  with graph elements, legends elements, titles and ggplot theme
  elements from the server part; each selection is available as a
  reactive value.

![](reference/figures/image_girafe.png)

> Under the hood, [ggiraph](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/) is an
> htmlwidget and a ggplot2 extension. It allows graphics to be
> interactive, by exporting them as SVG documents and using special
> attributes on the various elements.

## Usage

### With R and R Markdown

The things you need to know to create an interactive graphic :

- Instead of using `geom_point`, use `geom_point_interactive`, instead
  of using `geom_sf`, use `geom_sf_interactive`… Provide at least one of
  the aesthetics `tooltip`, `data_id` and `onclick` to create
  interactive elements.
- Call function `girafe` with the ggplot object so that the graphic is
  translated as a web interactive graphics.

``` r
library(ggplot2)
library(ggiraph)
data <- mtcars
data$carname <- row.names(data)

gg_point = ggplot(data = data) +
    geom_point_interactive(aes(x = wt, y = qsec, color = disp,
    tooltip = carname, data_id = carname)) + 
  theme_minimal()

girafe(ggobj = gg_point)
```

### With Shiny

- If used within a shiny application, elements associated with an id
  (`data_id`) can be selected and manipulated on client and server
  sides. The list of selected values will be stored in in a reactive
  value named `[shiny_id]_selected`.

![](reference/figures/shiny_girafe.png)

### Available interactive layers

They are several available interactive geometries, scales and other
ggplot elements. Almost all ggplot2 elements can be made interactive
with [ggiraph](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/). They are all
based on their ggplot version, same goes for scales and the few guides:
[`geom_point_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_point_interactive.md),
[`geom_col_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_bar_interactive.md),
[`geom_tile_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_rect_interactive.md),
[`scale_fill_manual_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_manual_interactive.md),
[`scale_discrete_manual_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_manual_interactive.md),
[`guide_legend_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/guide_legend_interactive.md),
…

You can also make interactive annotations, titles and facets (see
[`help(interactive_parameters)`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/interactive_parameters.md)).

## Installation

> Get development version on github

``` r
devtools::install_github('davidgohel/ggiraph')
```

> Get CRAN version

``` r
install.packages("ggiraph")
```

## Resources

### Online documentation

The help pages are located at <https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/>.

### Getting help

If you have questions about how to use the package, visit Stackoverflow
and use tags `ggiraph` and `r` [Stackoverflow
link](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/ggiraph+r)! We usually
read them and answer when possible.

## Contributing to the package

### Bug reports

When you file a [bug
report](https://github.com/davidgohel/ggiraph/issues), please spend some
time making it easy for me to follow and reproduce. The more time you
spend on making the bug report coherent, the more time I can dedicate to
investigate the bug as opposed to the bug report.

### Contributing to the package development

A great way to start is to contribute an example or improve the
documentation.

If you want to submit a Pull Request to integrate functions of yours,
provide if possible:

- the new function(s) with code and roxygen tags (with examples)
- a new section in the appropriate vignette that describes how to use
  the new function
- corresponding tests in directory `inst/tinytest`.

### Install from sources on macOS

Please read carefully the official R for macOS instructions:
<https://mac.r-project.org/>

To compile [ggiraph](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/) from source,
you need `libpng`. Using Homebrew is recommended:

``` R
brew install libpng
```

Then configure your `~/.R/Makevars` file with the appropriate paths. For
Apple Silicon Macs (M1/M2/M3), the typical configuration is:

``` R
CFLAGS=-I/opt/homebrew/include
CPPFLAGS=-I/opt/homebrew/include
CXXFLAGS=-I/opt/homebrew/include
CXX11FLAGS=-I/opt/homebrew/include
LDFLAGS=-L/opt/homebrew/lib
```

For Intel Macs, paths are usually `/usr/local/include` and
`/usr/local/lib` instead.

``` R
CFLAGS=-I/usr/local/include
CPPFLAGS=-I/usr/local/include
CXXFLAGS=-I/usr/local/include
CXX11FLAGS=-I/usr/local/include
LDFLAGS=-L/usr/local/lib
```

> Note: Paths may vary depending on your system configuration. We are
> unable to provide support for installation issues related to macOS
> compilation setup.

# Package index

## Make ggplot2 Graphics Interactive

- [`girafe()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/girafe.md)
  : Create a girafe object
- [`interactive_parameters`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/interactive_parameters.md)
  : Interactive parameters

## Customize girafe animations

- [`girafe_css()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/girafe_css.md)
  : CSS creation helper
- [`opts_hover()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/opts_hover.md)
  [`opts_hover_inv()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/opts_hover.md)
  [`opts_hover_key()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/opts_hover.md)
  [`opts_hover_theme()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/opts_hover.md)
  : Hover effect settings
- [`opts_selection()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/opts_selection.md)
  [`opts_selection_inv()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/opts_selection.md)
  [`opts_selection_key()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/opts_selection.md)
  [`opts_selection_theme()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/opts_selection.md)
  : Selection effect settings
- [`opts_sizing()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/opts_sizing.md)
  : Girafe sizing settings
- [`opts_toolbar()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/opts_toolbar.md)
  : Toolbar settings
- [`opts_tooltip()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/opts_tooltip.md)
  : Tooltip settings
- [`opts_zoom()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/opts_zoom.md)
  : Zoom settings
- [`girafe_options()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/girafe_options.md)
  : Set girafe options
- [`set_girafe_defaults()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/set_girafe_defaults.md)
  : Modify defaults girafe animation options
- [`girafe_defaults()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/girafe_defaults.md)
  : Get girafe defaults formatting properties
- [`init_girafe_defaults()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/init_girafe_defaults.md)
  : Re-init animation defaults options
- [`girafe_css_bicolor()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/girafe_css_bicolor.md)
  : Helper for a 'girafe' css string

## Working with shiny

- [`renderGirafe()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/renderGirafe.md)
  : Reactive version of girafe
- [`girafeOutput()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/girafeOutput.md)
  : Create a girafe output element
- [`run_girafe_example()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/run_girafe_example.md)
  : Run shiny examples and see corresponding code

## Interactive geometries

- [`geom_abline_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_abline_interactive.md)
  [`geom_hline_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_abline_interactive.md)
  [`geom_vline_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_abline_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive reference lines
- [`geom_bar_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_bar_interactive.md)
  [`geom_col_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_bar_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive bars
- [`geom_bin_2d_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_bin_2d_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive heatmaps of 2d bin counts
- [`geom_boxplot_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_boxplot_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive boxplot
- [`geom_contour_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_contour_interactive.md)
  [`geom_contour_filled_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_contour_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive 2d contours of a 3d surface
- [`geom_count_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_count_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive point counts
- [`geom_crossbar_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_crossbar_interactive.md)
  [`geom_errorbar_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_crossbar_interactive.md)
  [`geom_linerange_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_crossbar_interactive.md)
  [`geom_pointrange_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_crossbar_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive vertical intervals: lines, crossbars & errorbars
- [`geom_density_2d_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_density_2d_interactive.md)
  [`geom_density_2d_filled_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_density_2d_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive contours of a 2d density estimate
- [`geom_density_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_density_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive smoothed density estimates
- [`geom_dotplot_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_dotplot_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive dot plots
- [`geom_errorbarh_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_errorbarh_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive horizontal error bars
- [`geom_hex_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_hex_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive hexagonal heatmaps
- [`geom_freqpoly_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_histogram_interactive.md)
  [`geom_histogram_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_histogram_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive histograms and frequency polygons
- [`geom_jitter_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_jitter_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive jittered points
- [`geom_map_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_map_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive polygons from a reference map
- [`geom_path_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_path_interactive.md)
  [`geom_line_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_path_interactive.md)
  [`geom_step_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_path_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive observations connections
- [`geom_point_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_point_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive points
- [`geom_polygon_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_polygon_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive polygons
- [`geom_quantile_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_quantile_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive quantile regression
- [`geom_quasirandom_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_quasirandom_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive quasirandom geom
- [`geom_raster_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_raster_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive raster rectangles
- [`geom_rect_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_rect_interactive.md)
  [`geom_tile_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_rect_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive rectangles
- [`geom_ribbon_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_ribbon_interactive.md)
  [`geom_area_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_ribbon_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive ribbons and area plots
- [`geom_curve_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_segment_interactive.md)
  [`geom_segment_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_segment_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive line segments and curves
- [`geom_sf_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_sf_interactive.md)
  [`geom_sf_label_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_sf_interactive.md)
  [`geom_sf_text_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_sf_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive sf objects
- [`geom_smooth_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_smooth_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive smoothed conditional means
- [`geom_spoke_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_spoke_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive line segments parameterised by location,
  direction and distance
- [`geom_label_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_text_interactive.md)
  [`geom_text_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_text_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive textual annotations
- [`geom_text_repel_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_text_repel_interactive.md)
  [`geom_label_repel_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_text_repel_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive repulsive textual annotations
- [`geom_violin_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/geom_violin_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive violin plot

## Interactive scales

- [`scale_alpha_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_alpha_interactive.md)
  [`scale_alpha_continuous_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_alpha_interactive.md)
  [`scale_alpha_discrete_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_alpha_interactive.md)
  [`scale_alpha_binned_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_alpha_interactive.md)
  [`scale_alpha_ordinal_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_alpha_interactive.md)
  [`scale_alpha_date_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_alpha_interactive.md)
  [`scale_alpha_datetime_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_alpha_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive scales for alpha transparency
- [`scale_colour_brewer_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_brewer_interactive.md)

  [`scale_fill_fermenter_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_brewer_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive colorbrewer scales
- [`scale_colour_continuous_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_interactive.md)
  [`scale_color_continuous_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_interactive.md)
  [`scale_fill_continuous_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_interactive.md)
  [`scale_colour_grey_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_interactive.md)
  [`scale_color_grey_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_interactive.md)
  [`scale_fill_grey_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_interactive.md)
  [`scale_colour_hue_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_interactive.md)
  [`scale_color_hue_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_interactive.md)
  [`scale_fill_hue_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_interactive.md)
  [`scale_colour_binned_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_interactive.md)
  [`scale_color_binned_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_interactive.md)
  [`scale_fill_binned_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_interactive.md)
  [`scale_colour_discrete_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_interactive.md)
  [`scale_color_discrete_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_interactive.md)
  [`scale_fill_discrete_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_interactive.md)
  [`scale_colour_date_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_interactive.md)
  [`scale_color_date_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_interactive.md)
  [`scale_fill_date_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_interactive.md)
  [`scale_colour_datetime_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_interactive.md)
  [`scale_color_datetime_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_interactive.md)
  [`scale_fill_datetime_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive colour scales
- [`scale_colour_steps_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_steps_interactive.md)
  [`scale_color_steps_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_steps_interactive.md)
  [`scale_fill_steps_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_steps_interactive.md)
  [`scale_colour_steps2_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_steps_interactive.md)
  [`scale_color_steps2_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_steps_interactive.md)
  [`scale_fill_steps2_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_steps_interactive.md)
  [`scale_colour_stepsn_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_steps_interactive.md)
  [`scale_color_stepsn_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_steps_interactive.md)
  [`scale_fill_stepsn_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_colour_steps_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive binned gradient colour scales
- [`scale_colour_gradient_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_gradient_interactive.md)
  [`scale_color_gradient_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_gradient_interactive.md)
  [`scale_fill_gradient_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_gradient_interactive.md)
  [`scale_colour_gradient2_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_gradient_interactive.md)
  [`scale_color_gradient2_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_gradient_interactive.md)
  [`scale_fill_gradient2_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_gradient_interactive.md)
  [`scale_colour_gradientn_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_gradient_interactive.md)
  [`scale_color_gradientn_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_gradient_interactive.md)
  [`scale_fill_gradientn_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_gradient_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive gradient colour scales
- [`scale_linetype_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_linetype_interactive.md)
  [`scale_linetype_continuous_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_linetype_interactive.md)
  [`scale_linetype_discrete_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_linetype_interactive.md)
  [`scale_linetype_binned_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_linetype_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive scales for line patterns
- [`scale_colour_manual_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_manual_interactive.md)
  [`scale_color_manual_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_manual_interactive.md)
  [`scale_fill_manual_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_manual_interactive.md)
  [`scale_size_manual_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_manual_interactive.md)
  [`scale_shape_manual_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_manual_interactive.md)
  [`scale_linetype_manual_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_manual_interactive.md)
  [`scale_alpha_manual_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_manual_interactive.md)
  [`scale_discrete_manual_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_manual_interactive.md)
  : Create your own interactive discrete scale
- [`scale_shape_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_shape_interactive.md)
  [`scale_shape_continuous_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_shape_interactive.md)
  [`scale_shape_discrete_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_shape_interactive.md)
  [`scale_shape_binned_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_shape_interactive.md)
  [`scale_shape_ordinal_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_shape_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive scales for shapes
- [`scale_size_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_size_interactive.md)
  [`scale_size_area_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_size_interactive.md)
  [`scale_size_continuous_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_size_interactive.md)
  [`scale_size_discrete_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_size_interactive.md)

  [`scale_size_datetime_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_size_interactive.md)
  [`scale_size_ordinal_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_size_interactive.md)
  [`scale_radius_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_size_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive scales for area or radius
- [`scale_colour_viridis_d_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_viridis_interactive.md)
  [`scale_color_viridis_d_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_viridis_interactive.md)

  [`scale_fill_viridis_c_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_viridis_interactive.md)
  [`scale_colour_viridis_b_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_viridis_interactive.md)
  [`scale_color_viridis_b_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_viridis_interactive.md)
  [`scale_fill_viridis_b_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_viridis_interactive.md)
  [`scale_colour_ordinal_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/scale_viridis_interactive.md)

  : Create interactive viridis colour scales

  : Create interactive bins guide

  : Create interactive legend guide

## Interactive facets

- [`facet_grid_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/facet_grid_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive grid facets
- [`facet_wrap_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/facet_wrap_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive wraped facets
- [`labeller_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/labeller_interactive.md)
  : Construct interactive labelling specification for facet strips

## Fonts

- [`match_family()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/match_family.md)
  : Find best family match with systemfonts
- [`validated_fonts()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/validated_fonts.md)
  : List of validated default fonts

## Other interactive layers

- [`annotate_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/annotate_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive annotations
- [`annotation_raster_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/annotation_raster_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive raster annotations
- [`label_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/label_interactive.md)
  : Create an interactive label
- [`element_line_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/element_interactive.md)
  [`element_rect_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/element_interactive.md)
  [`element_text_interactive()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/element_interactive.md)
  : Create interactive theme elements

## Grobs

- [`interactive_circle_grob()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/interactive_circle_grob.md)
  : Create interactive circles grob
- [`interactive_curve_grob()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/interactive_curve_grob.md)
  : Create interactive curve grob
- [`interactive_path_grob()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/interactive_path_grob.md)
  : Create interactive path grob
- [`interactive_points_grob()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/interactive_points_grob.md)
  : Create interactive points grob
- [`interactive_polygon_grob()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/interactive_polygon_grob.md)
  : Create interactive polygon grob
- [`interactive_polyline_grob()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/interactive_polyline_grob.md)
  [`interactive_lines_grob()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/interactive_polyline_grob.md)
  : Create interactive polyline grob
- [`interactive_raster_grob()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/interactive_raster_grob.md)
  : Create interactive raster grob
- [`interactive_rect_grob()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/interactive_rect_grob.md)
  : Create interactive rectangle grob
- [`interactive_roundrect_grob()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/interactive_roundrect_grob.md)
  : Create interactive rectangle grob
- [`interactive_segments_grob()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/interactive_segments_grob.md)
  : Create interactive segments grob
- [`interactive_text_grob()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/interactive_text_grob.md)
  : Create interactive text grob

## Girafe graphic device

- [`dsvg()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/dsvg.md)
  : SVG Graphics Driver
- [`dsvg_view()`](https://davidgohel.github.io/ggiraph/dev/reference/dsvg_view.md)
  : Run plotting code and view svg in RStudio Viewer or web broswer.
